INVESTMENT HYPOTHESIS: High Concentration Risk in RELIANCE

Type: risk
Confidence: 90%
Time Horizon: medium-term
Affected Stocks: RELIANCE

Description:
Portfolio is 58.8% concentrated in RELIANCE. This exceeds the recommended 30% single-stock limit and increases idiosyncratic risk.

Supporting Evidence:
• RELIANCE represents 58.8% of portfolio
• Recommended single-stock allocation is below 30%
• Concentration increases vulnerability to stock-specific events

Potential Actions:
• Consider trimming RELIANCE position by 33.8%
• Diversify into other sectors or asset classes
• Use protective puts if maintaining position

Risk Factors:
• Single stock events can significantly impact portfolio
• Regulatory or company-specific news exposure
• Liquidity risk during market stress
